## notification package

A library for notifying the user of a system with a snack bar popup.

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [NotificationModule](./notification.notificationmodule.md) | Responsible for declaring components. |
|  [NotificationService](./notification.notificationservice.md) | Responsible for queueing and displaying notifications provided by user as a snack bar |

## Enumerations

|  Enumeration | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [NotificationType](./notification.notificationtype.md) | The different type of notifications supported. |

## Interfaces

|  Interface | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [AppNotification](./notification.appnotification.md) | Represents an object with data required to display a notification |
